PersistentScript.name: skriptos
PersistentScript.script:
init start nickgracza = "" -- nick gracza north = false -- czy gramy w gornym dp zamkniety = false -- czy gracz jest zamkniety odczytano = false -- odczytalem wiadomosc od rollera jestnowaodp = false -- roller odpowiedzial wiadomosczwrotna = "" -- wiadomosc od rollera playing = false -- czy aktualnie char gra z kims mainbpindp = false -- gdzie szukac main backpacka startcasino = false tableposx = 0 tableposy = 0 depotposx = 0 depotposy = 0 playerposx = 0 playerposy = 0 pcname = "platinum coin" ccname = "crystal coin" minbet = 0 maxbet = 0 --(w gp czyli 1000 to 1k) userchoice = ""--(low lub high) wplata = 0 --(ile ktos wplacil i poszlo do bpkow) winitem = "" loseitem = "" usehat = false winrate = 0 canplay = false adtime = 0 ad1 = "" gametext = ""
showuseroption('stopcasino', false)
casino = false tapestry = false tapestryname = "" ondpitem = false ondpitemname = ""
function zobaczdp()
zm = false
local tile = gettile($posx, $posy-1, $posz) for i=1, tile.itemcount do if tile.item[i].id == 3499 then zn = true nnn = true end end local tile = gettile($posx, $posy+1, $posz) for i=1, tile.itemcount do if tile.item[i].id == 3497 then zn = true nnn = false end end
if zn then north = nnn end end
init end auto(400) zobaczdp()
if getuseroption('wherebps') == "Depot" then mainbpindp = true else mainbpindp = false end mainbp = getuseroption('mainbp') payoutbp = getuseroption('payoutbp') ccbp = getuseroption('ccbp') pcbp = getuseroption('pcbp') startcasino = getuseroption('startcasino')

PersistentScript.name: RollDice
PersistentScript.script:
init start numerek = 0 lastmsgid = 0 loss = 0 wiadomosczwrotna = 0 function navmessages(msg) print(msg) if msg.charname ~= $name then numerek = string.match(msg.message, "(%d+):") if tonumber(numerek) == tonumber(lastmsgid) then loss = tonumber(string.match(msg.message, ":(.+)")) odczytaj(msg.message) --print(wiadomosczwrotna) end end end
function odczytaj(wiado) wiadomosczwrotna = string.match(wiado, ":(.+)") odczytano = true end
function wykonaj(wiad) odczytano = false navsay(lastmsgid..":"..wiad)
end
function zakrec() odczytano = false lastmsgid = math.random(100) ::krecenieznowu:: navsay(lastmsgid..":zakrec") ctr = 0 while not odczytano do ctr = ctr + 1 wait(100) if ctr > 20 then goto krecenieznowu ctr = 0 end
end
return loss end
init end

PersistentScript.name: podchodzenie
PersistentScript.script:
init start
init end
auto(50) if casino then if nickgracza then if $self.dir ~= "e" then turn("e") end
else if north then if $self.dir ~= "s" then turn("s") end else if $self.dir ~= "n" then turn("n") end end end end

PersistentScript.name: SprawdzanieGracza
PersistentScript.script:
init start function checkplayer() local niczek foreach creature c do if c.posx == $posx+2 and c.posy == $posy and c.posz == $posz then niczek = c.name end end return niczek end init end
auto(100) nickgracza = checkplayer()

PersistentScript.name: getmessages
PersistentScript.script:
init start
init end
auto(50)
if zamkniety and not playing and casino then foreach newmessage msg do print(msg) if msg.sender ~= "" and msg.sender == nickgracza then if string.lower(msg.content) == "l" or string.lower(msg.content) == "lo" or string.lower(msg.content) == "low" or string.lower(msg.content) == "123" then userchoice = "low" graj() end if string.lower(msg.content) == "h" or string.lower(msg.content) == "hi" or string.lower(msg.content) == "hig" or string.lower(msg.content) == "high" or string.lower(msg.content) == "456" then userchoice = "high" graj() end if string.find(string.lower(msg.content),"game") then say(gametext) end if string.find(string.lower(msg.content),"min") then say(minb.."K") end if string.find(string.lower(msg.content),"max") then say(maxb.."K") end
end end end

PersistentScript.name: CharactersNicks
PersistentScript.script:
init start function countnavchars() local ilecharow = 0
foreach navchar navc do ilecharow = ilecharow + 1 end return ilecharow end
msgshowed = false
init end auto(1000)
if (countnavchars() == 2) then foreach navchar n do if n.realname ~= $name then fname = n.realname end end else if not msgshowed then messagebox("Navi Problem", "Hey! on navi room must be only 2 characters "..$name.." and character to roll dice.") msgshowed = true end end
friend = getcreature(fname) if north then if friend.posx == $posx + 2 and friend.posy == $posy + 1 and friend.posz == $posz then zamkniety = true else zamkniety = false end else if friend.posx == $posx + 2 and friend.posy == $posy - 1 and friend.posz == $posz then zamkniety = true else zamkniety = false end
end

PersistentScript.name: AntiIdle
PersistentScript.script:
init start local lastStand = $standtime local randTime = math.random(300000, 350000) init end
auto(100) if not playing then if $standtime < lastStand then lastStand = $standtime end
if $standtime - lastStand > randTime then local dirs = {'n', 's'}
-- Makes sure it's random and not the same we're facing right now table.remove(dirs, table.find(dirs, $self.dir)) turn(dirs[1]) waitping()
lastStand = $standtime randTime = math.random(300000, 350000) end end

PersistentScript.name: gamefunctions
PersistentScript.script:
init start
function reloadinfo() winitem = getuseroption('winitem') loseitem = getuseroption('loseitem') usehat = getuseroption('partyhat') minbet = getuseroption('minbet') * 1000 maxbet = getuseroption('maxbet') * 1000 minb = minbet / 1000 maxb = maxbet / 1000 winrate = getuseroption('winrate') adtime = getuseroption('adtime') ad1 = getuseroption('ad1') gametext = getuseroption('gamestext') tapestry = getuseroption('tapestry') tapestryname = getuseroption('tapestryname') ondpitem = getuseroption('ondpitem') ondpitemname = getuseroption('ondpitemname') if ondpitem then maxondp = 4 else maxondp = 3 end if north then tableposx = $posx + 1 tableposy = $posy - 1 depotposx = $posx depotposy = $posy - 1 else tableposx = $posx + 1 tableposy = $posy + 1 depotposx = $posx depotposy = $posy + 1 end end
function getready() playing = true closewindows() while windowcount() < 5 do if north then tableposx = $posx + 1 tableposy = $posy - 1 depotposx = $posx depotposy = $posy - 1 else tableposx = $posx + 1 tableposy = $posy + 1 depotposx = $posx depotposy = $posy + 1 end closewindows() wait(1000) browsefield(tableposx,tableposy,$posz) wait(1000) if mainbpindp then if windowcount("Depot Chest") == 0 then opendepot() wait(500) end if windowcount(mainbp) == 0 then openitem(mainbp) wait(300) end else openitem(mainbp,'back') end wait(1000) openitem(payoutbp,mainbp,true) wait(1000) openitem(ccbp,mainbp,true) wait(1000) resizewindows() wait(1000) openitem(pcbp,mainbp,true) wait(1000) resizewindows() end
if tapestry then if topitem(depotposx-1, depotposy, $posz).id ~= itemid(tapestryname) and topitem(depotposx-1, depotposy, $posz).id ~= tonumber(tapestryname) then wait(1000) local tile = gettile(depotposx-1, depotposy, $posz) if tile.itemcount > 2 then moveitems(topitem(depotposx-1, depotposy, $posz).id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz),ground(depotposx-1, depotposy, $posz)) end if itemcount(tapestryname) > 0 or itemcount(tonumber(tapestryname)) > 0 then wait(1000) moveitems(itemid(tapestryname),ground(depotposx-1, depotposy, $posz)) moveitems(itemid(tonumber(tapestryname)),ground(depotposx, depotposy, $posz)) end end end
if ondpitem then if topitem(depotposx, depotposy, $posz).id ~= itemid(ondpitemname) and topitem(depotposx, depotposy, $posz).id ~= tonumber(ondpitemname) then wait(1000) local tile = gettile(depotposx, depotposy, $posz) if tile.itemcount > 3 then moveitems(topitem(depotposx, depotposy, $posz).id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz),ground(depotposx, depotposy, $posz)) wait(1000) end if itemcount(ondpitemname) > 0 or itemcount(tonumber(ondpitemname)) > 0 then moveitems(itemid(ondpitemname),ground(depotposx, depotposy, $posz)) moveitems(itemid(tonumber(ondpitemname)),ground(depotposx, depotposy, $posz))
end end end
playing = false end function moneyincontainer(c) local allmoney = (((itemcount(pcname,c) * 100) + (itemcount(ccname,c)*10000))) return allmoney end function graj() playing = true
if moneyincontainer("Browse Field") >= minbet and moneyincontainer("Browse Field") <= maxbet then
while moneyincontainer("Browse Field") > 0 do moveitems(ccname,mainbp, "Browse Field") wait(100) moveitems(pcname,mainbp,"Browse Field") wait(100) end wait(100) wplata = moneyincontainer(mainbp) -- zrobic zeby zakrecil ale wczesniej musi zmienic odczytano na false -- while odczytanofalse to czekaj -- zakrecono = to co zwroci zakrecenie odczytano = false
if zakrec() <= 3 then wynik = "low" else wynik = "high" end
if userchoice == wynik then wygrana = true else wygrana = false end
if wygrana then useitem(winitem)
--wygral print("wplata: "..wplata) local sumawygrana = wplata * winrate local pcdowyplaty = math.floor((sumawygrana % 10000)/100) local ccdowyplaty = math.floor(sumawygrana / 10000) print("wygrana: "..sumawygrana) print("pcdowyplaty: "..pcdowyplaty) print("ccdowyplaty: "..ccdowyplaty)
while itemcount(ccname,payoutbp) ~= ccdowyplaty do if itemcount(ccname,payoutbp) > ccdowyplaty then moveitems(ccname,ccbp,payoutbp) wait(100) end moveitems(ccname,payoutbp,ccbp,(ccdowyplaty- itemcount(ccname,payoutbp))) wait(100) if itemcount(ccname,payoutbp) < ccdowyplaty then moveitems(ccname,payoutbp,ccbp,(ccdowyplaty - itemcount(ccname,payoutbp))) wait(100) end
end
while itemcount(pcname,payoutbp) ~= pcdowyplaty do if itemcount(pcname,payoutbp) > pcdowyplaty then moveitems(pcname,pcbp,payoutbp) wait(100) end moveitems(pcname,payoutbp,pcbp,(pcdowyplaty- itemcount(pcname,payoutbp))) wait(100) if itemcount(pcname,payoutbp) < pcdowyplaty then moveitems(pcname,payoutbp,pcbp,(pcdowyplaty - itemcount(pcname,payoutbp))) wait(100) end
end
while moneyincontainer(payoutbp) > 0 do moveitems(pcname,ground(tableposx,tableposy,$posz), payoutbp) wait(100) moveitems(ccname,ground(tableposx,tableposy,$posz), payoutbp) wait(100)
end
while moneyincontainer(mainbp) > 0 do moveitems(ccname,ccbp, mainbp) wait(100) moveitems(pcname,pcbp,mainbp) wait(100) end else print("wplata: "..wplata) useitem(loseitem) while moneyincontainer(mainbp) > 0 do moveitems(ccname,ccbp, mainbp) wait(100) moveitems(pcname,pcbp,mainbp) wait(100) end end
else
say("Min bet is: "..minb.."K, and max bet: "..maxb.."K.") --zla kwota (napisac)
end if itemcount(pcname,pcbp) < 100 then if itemcount(pcbp,pcbp) > 0 then openitem(pcbp,pcbp,false) end end playing = false end
init end auto(1000) reloadinfo() local tile = gettile(depotposx, depotposy, $posz) if casino and (windowcount() < 5 or (tapestry and topitem(depotposx-1, depotposy, $posz).id ~= itemid(tapestryname)) or (ondpitem and topitem(depotposx, depotposy, $posz).id ~= itemid(ondpitemname) and tile.itemcount < maxondp)) then getready() end

PersistentScript.name: game
PersistentScript.script:
init start nrgame = 0 init end auto(1000) nrgame = nrgame + 1 if not playing then if usehat and casino then useitem("party hat") end if nrgame > adtime and casino then say("Local Chat",ad1) nrgame = 0 end
local tile = gettile(depotposx, depotposy, $posz) if tile.itemcount > maxondp then
if topitem(depotposx,depotposy,$posz).id == 3035 or topitem(depotposx,depotposy,$posz).id == 3043 then moveitems(3035,ground(tableposx,tableposy,$posz),ground(depotposx,depotposy,$posz)) moveitems(3043,ground(tableposx,tableposy,$posz),ground(depotposx,depotposy,$posz)) else moveitems(topitem(depotposx,depotposy,$posz).id,ground(tableposx+1,tableposy,$posz),ground(depotposx,depotposy,$posz)) end end local tile = gettile(depotposx+1, depotposy, $posz) if tile.itemcount > 2 then if topitem(tableposx,tableposy,$posz).id == 3035 or topitem(tableposx,tableposy,$posz).id == 3043 then else moveitems(topitem(tableposx,tableposy,$posz).id,ground(tableposx+1,tableposy,$posz),ground(tableposx,tableposy,$posz)) end end
end

PersistentScript.name: Buttons
PersistentScript.script:
init start function inputevents(e) if e.name == 'startcasino' then -- do something casino = true showuseroption("stopcasino",true) showuseroption("startcasino",false) end if e.name == 'stopcasino' then -- do something casino = false showuseroption("stopcasino",false) showuseroption("startcasino",true) end end
filteruseroptions(true) init end

HUDScript.name: generalinfoo
HUDScript.script:
init start -- local SCRIPT_VERSION = '1.0.0'
local fontsize = 10 local fontspacing = fontsize + 6 setfontstyle("MS Serif", 10, 100, 0xCCCCCC, 1, 0x555555)
local displayontitle = true -- set it to false to display it as a rectangular info instead local maxsize = 220
setmaskcolorxp(0) init end
auto(100) local info = { {color = 0xff5577, text = 'Exp/h: ', value = num($exphour)}, {color = 0xcccccc, text = 'Ping: ', value = num($pingaverage)}, {color = 0xc6b2ea, text = 'ItemID: ', value = $cursorinfo.id}, {color = 0xc6b2ea, text = 'x: ', value = $cursorinfo.x}, {color = 0xc6b2ea, text = 'y: ', value = $cursorinfo.y}, {color = 0xc6b2ea, text = 'z: ', value = $cursorinfo.z}, }
if (displayontitle) then local x = 0 for _,j in ipairs(info) do local str = j.text .. j.value local w = measurestring(str)
setfontcolor(j.color) drawtext(str, x, 0) x = x + w + 50 end
setposition($clientwin.left + 30, $clientwin.top - 21) else for i,j in ipairs(info) do local w = measurestring(j.value) local posy = (i-1)*fontspacing
setfontcolor(j.color) drawtext(j.text, 2, posy) drawtext(j.value, maxsize-w, posy) end
setposition($worldwin.left+20, $worldwin.top+8) end
